TraitDef.label: The Warrior
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Warrior, this person excels in combat and physical prowess. The Warrior grants natural talent in blade, blunt, and heavy armor skills.

li.label: The Warrior
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Warrior, granting enhanced combat abilities and physical prowess.

TraitDef.label: The Mage
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Mage, this person has natural magical abilities and enhanced mental faculties. The Mage grants increased magical power and spell effectiveness.

li.label: The Mage
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Mage, granting enhanced magical abilities and intellectual prowess.

TraitDef.label: The Thief
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Thief, this person excels in stealth, agility, and dexterous tasks. The Thief grants natural talent in security, sneak, and marksman skills.

li.label: The Thief
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Thief, granting enhanced stealth and dexterity.

TraitDef.label: The Serpent
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Serpent, this person has natural resistance to poison and disease, along with the ability to inflict poison damage on enemies.

li.label: The Serpent
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Serpent, granting poison resistance and venomous abilities.

TraitDef.label: The Lady
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Lady, this person has enhanced social abilities and natural grace. The Lady grants bonuses to personality and willpower.

li.label: The Lady
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Lady, granting enhanced social grace and personal magnetism.

TraitDef.label: The Steed
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Steed, this person has enhanced speed and endurance. The Steed grants increased movement speed and stamina.

li.label: The Steed
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Steed, granting exceptional speed and endurance.

TraitDef.label: The Lord
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Lord, this person has enhanced durability and natural leadership. The Lord provides resistance to fire and increased health.

li.label: The Lord
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Lord, granting natural leadership and resilience.

TraitDef.label: The Apprentice
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Apprentice, this person has a natural affinity for magic but is vulnerable to magical attacks. Increased magicka but weakness to magic.

li.label: The Apprentice
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Apprentice, granting magical talent but vulnerability to magic.

TraitDef.label: The Atronach
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Atronach, this person has massive magical potential but cannot regenerate it naturally. Spell absorption but inability to regenerate magicka.

li.label: The Atronach
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Atronach, granting immense magical power but with limitations.

TraitDef.label: The Ritual
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Ritual, this person has a natural connection to the undead and spiritual realm. Provides resistance to disease and enhanced restoration magic.

li.label: The Ritual
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Ritual, granting connection to spiritual forces.

TraitDef.label: The Lover
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Lover, this person has enhanced charm and social abilities. The Lover grants bonuses to personality and agility skills.

li.label: The Lover
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Lover, granting exceptional charm and social grace.

TraitDef.label: The Shadow
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Shadow, this person excels in stealth and has natural invisibility abilities. Enhanced stealth skills and movement in darkness.

li.label: The Shadow
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Shadow, granting mastery over stealth and darkness.

TraitDef.label: The Tower
TraitDef.description: Born under the sign of The Tower, this person has natural lock-picking abilities and enhanced security skills. The Tower grants the ability to open locks and enhanced dexterity.

li.label: The Tower
li.description: Born under the constellation of The Tower, granting mastery over security and construction.
